dmca.title: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Report]
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, June 27, 2005 9:41 AM
To: ebook.watch@gmail.com; copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Report]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Copyright Infringement Report
Date: Sun, 26 Jun 2005 19:25:45 +0700
From: Independent Group of eBook Distribution Watch <ebook.watch@gmail.com>
Reply-To: Independent Group of eBook Distribution Watch
<ebook.watch@gmail.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplamet.com, abuse@real-hosts.com,
abuse@visiglobal.net
CC: legal@manning.com

To Whom it May Concern:

There are some illegal copies of copyrighted book hosted on your server.

Proof:
orange.real-hosts.com (70.85.98.3):
http://www.asmuni.com/upload/
http://www.asmuni.com/upload/bitter%20java%20-%20manning.rar (Book
Title: Bitter Java by Manning Publishing)
http://www.asmuni.com/upload/Java%202%20Network%20Security.zip

aqua.real-hosts.com (70.85.98.6):
http://70.85.98.6/~ebook/
http://70.85.98.6/~ebook/download_center_lite/index.php?devinfaces.zip
File list available at:
http://70.85.98.6/~ebook/download_center_lite/logfiles/count.txt

Please take an action against the owner of the website as soon as possible.

Thank you for your cooperation

- --
Independent Group of eBook Distribution Watch ebook.watch@gmail.com


- --
Thanks,
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCwBAQvK/XpJs6oyURAtMmAKCerjI06rOLc65SFPPB78QrQK6tfgCfWycN
jP2pFZXbC/nPqhQFVMKTXoQ=
=s8yk
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
dmca.principal_name: Independent Group of eBook Distribution Watch
